rules_text:
When Suckling Spawn enters the battlefield or dies, mill three cards.
Artifact cards and enchantment cards in your graveyard have unearth. The unearth cost is equal to their mana cost. [i](Pay the card’s mana cost: Return it to the battlefield. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)[/i]
